Upgrade from SmarterMail Lite and access these administration features:
Click here to learn more
  • Mass Messaging to Users and Admins
  • Throttling of Domains and Users
  • Support for IMAP4 and IMAP IDLE
  • LDAP Server
Additional features are available to all users:
  • Sync with BlackBerry and iPhone
  • Sync with Outlook and Thunderbird
  • Shared Contacts/Calendars/Tasks
  • Global Address List

Upgrade from SmarterMail Lite and access these administration features:
Click here to learn more
  • Dozens of Advanced Reports
  • Define Custom Reports
  • Exposed Report Statistics
Additional features are available to all users:
  • Multiple Advanced Summary Reports
  • Create Report Favorites
  • Scheduled Email Reports

Upgrade from SmarterMail Lite and access these administration features:
Click here to learn more
  • Greylisting with IP Whitelisting
  • SpamAssassin Out-of-the-box
  • ClamAV Out-of-the-box
  • DomainKeys
  • Support for SSL/TLS connections

Upgrade from SmarterMail Lite and access these administration features:
Click here to learn more
  • Mass Propagation of Settings
  • Prioritization of Messages
  • System-wide Message Archiving
  • Authentication for Gateways
Additional features are available to all users:
  • Advanced Content Filtering
  • Compatible with Custom Skins
  • Configure/Assign Actions to Events
  • Create/Manage Mailing Lists

This process will add a folder to your Outlook client that will connect to SmarterMail and download your information. This is done through the STSSync protocol which connects Microsoft Sharepoint to Microsoft Outlook. This process will only work if you have Microsoft Outlook 2003 or higher (not Express) installed. Additionally, security software such as McAfee may prevent this from working correctly.

  • *.VCF – vCard files
  • *.CSV – Comma-separated text files
  • *.ZIP – Zip archives containing any combination of VCF and CSV files

SmarterMail offers an enhanced messaging interface that updates without reloading the page. This feature makes viewing messages much faster overal, but may not work properly on older computers or on browsers such as Opera or Safari.

Take a moment to set your time zone so that SmarterMail can display items in your local time. This can be modified later from the Account Settings Page found under the the Settings section of the main toolbar.

SmarterMail now allows you to preview messages without downloading a new page. This will increase the initial page load, but can help preview and evaluate messages and their content. Select from a small or large number of lines to preview.
SmarterMail now displays all messages in your local time zone. Please select your Time Zone.

When Declude has been installed on the server, it can be enabled from the {0} page.

Declude is an industry leader in developing, delivering and supporting enterprise-wide solutions ensuring a secure Internet, network and communications infrastructure protected from unwanted messages and threats. Declude offers software specifically designed to work at the server level to detect and halt the spread of spam, viruses, worms and Trojan horses from infiltrating the enterprise.
This feature is only available in SmarterMail Enterprise. It is also enabled in the Free Edition in order to test the functionality.

SmarterMail is currently running as a BETA. During the beta period, SmarterMail will allow for unlimited domains and users with full enterprise functionality. When the beta version expires, SmarterMail will run as the free edition which allows for a single domain with up to 10 users. The SmarterMail beta will expire on {0}.

SmarterMail is currently running as Free Edition. While this version allows you a full mail server implementation for a single domain with up to 10 users, by upgrading to a fully licensed version of SmarterMail you not only expand upon the functionality available, you are also able to host email for more than a single domain and are eligible for full technical support.

To take advantage of the full power of SmarterMail, purchase a license online at {0} and click on the [Activate License Key] button above.

There are too many servers configured for this license. As a result, some sites may refuse to accept logins until the license is upgraded. Go to http://www.smartertools.com and contact sales for more information.

Set the weights that are recommended for domain administrators to use for low, medium and high spam probabilities. By default these should be 10 for low, 20 for medium and 30 for high. If the default Declude weights are changed, these recommended settings should also be updated to reflect those changes.

By default, SmarterMail will run a version of SpamAssassin on 127.0.0.1:783. If you wish to set up your own version of SpamAssassin, do so, and then go to Security->SpamAssassin to add an additional server.
These settings will help deal with an unresponsive SpamAssassin client.

Set the weights that are recommended for domain administrators to use for low, medium and high spam probabilities. By default these should be 10 for low, 20 for medium and 30 for high. SmarterMail will scale the weight returned by SpamAssassin to match these recommended weights.

By default, SpamAssassin works as a local Windows process.

If you wish to set up SpamAssassin on external servers, enter the server information here. The default port for SpamAssassin is 783. For detailed information on setting up a SpamAssassin server, click here.
This is the timeout that SmarterMail will impose on a server if it cannot be connected to.

By default, ClamAV listens on address 127.0.0.1, port 3310. For more information, click "Help for this page."
If you wish to use a command-line virus scanner, enter the path to the scanner here. %FILEPATH will be replaced with the path to the file to be scanned.
Unable to obtain virus definitions for a disabled or remote ClamAV server.

In order to allow a real-time virus scanner time to perform its job, please ensure that you have specified a sufficient delivery delay in General Settings. SmarterTools recommends a delivery delay of 20-30 seconds when using a real-time virus scanner.
Virus scanner stores files in a quarantine folder

SmarterMail provides virus scanning support through the use of ClamAV.

A version of ClamAV is installed but only activated if the option is enabled. Only messages coming in and out of the spool are checked for viruses. If any other virus scanners are installed, ensure that the spool is not being scanned with multiple virus scanners. SmarterMail also supports third party scanners which can be configured later.
The DNS settings will allow your mail server to resolve domains on the internet. These fields can be left blank which will use the defaults of the operating system.
The password and verify password fields do not match
Please enter a password to use for the system administrator

These directories are the defaults used by the SmarterMail application to store all configuration and mailbox information. These settings can be configured later if you wish to isolate drives and directories for different purposes.

SmarterMail provides additional spam protection through the use of SpamAssassin.

A version of SpamAssassin is installed but only activated if the option is enabled. The Windows version is limited to scanning around 1,600 messages an hour. If the server processes more messages than that per day, it is recommended to not enable this option. For systems with higher volume, additional settings can be configured later to support these environments.
For those servers that have a higher load than the Windows version of SpamAssassin can handle, SmarterMail can be set to call SpamAssassin running on a separate server under an OS such as Linux.

Please enter the hostname for your server as well as the username and password for the System Administrator account.

The hostname should be a fully qualified domain name that resolves to an IP address which has a reverse DNS entry pointing back to the hostname.

Take me to the Antispam administration page

SmarterMail now includes SpamAssassin. This provides a high level of spam protection for no cost. The version installed with SmarterMail has speed limitations due to the fact that it runs on Windows. It can process around 1,600 messages an hour. Outgoing messages are not scanned, so those are not affected. This will fit the needs of most small and medium sized companies. Large companies, hosting companies and ISPs can still use SpamAssassin with SmarterMail but will need to setup a Linux server to run it on in order to handle the higher volume of incoming messages.
SpamAssassin can be enabled from the "Antispam Administration" page accessed from the "Security" menu, just like any of the other SmarterMail spam check options.
